mapper.sql: SELECT p.SEQ, m.ID,p.TITLE,p.CONTENT,p.REGDATE,p.REF,p.STEP,p.DEPTH,p.READCOUNT,p.DELFLAG,p.REGDATE,p.NOTICE,p.MEMBER_SEQ,p.BOARD_SEQ,p.CATEGORY_SEQ FROM POST p, MEMBER m WHERE p.MEMBER_SEQ = m.SEQ
mapper.select: SELECT p.SEQ, m.ID,p.TITLE,p.CONTENT,p.REGDATE,p.REF,p.STEP,p.DEPTH,p.READCOUNT,p.DELFLAG,p.REGDATE,p.NOTICE,p.MEMBER_SEQ,p.BOARD_SEQ,p.CATEGORY_SEQ FROM POST p, MEMBER m WHERE p.MEMBER_SEQ = m.SEQ AND p.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} ORDER BY REF,STEP
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, READCOUNT, DELFLAG, REGDATE, NOTICE, MEMBER_SEQ, BOARD_SEQ, CATEGORY_SEQ) VALUES (POST_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{title}, #{content}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF)+1,0) FROM POST), 0, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE, 0, #{member_seq}, #{board_seq}, #{category_seq})
